work-item.field:
Before we go on creating a new wiki page you should explore these API classes, their parameters and return values to get a feeling about their functionallity. Please take your time it might save you some time in the future.
Try some simple functions like:
  • $me
  • $page.project
  • $page.name
  • $platformService.polarionProductName
  • $platformService.polarionVersion
Hint: These are just easy examples which return a String. You will find much more methods you might use while creating scripts.
